    • main

      public static void main(String... argv)

    • writeCsv

      public static void writeCsv(File file, Statisticboard statisticboardCSV, boolean iteration)
      Write the statistics in the csv file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to write
      statisticboardCSV - the statisticboard to write
      iteration - true if the statisticboard is for the second series of thousand games

    • secureReadOrCreateStatisticboard

      public static Statisticboard secureReadOrCreateStatisticboard(File file, Player[] players, boolean iteration)
      Read the statisticboard from the csv file if it exists, otherwise create a new one.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to read
      players - the players of the game
      iteration - true if the statisticboard is for the second series of thousand games
      Returns:
      the statisticboard read or created

    • runDemonstration

      public void runDemonstration()
      Run a single game with a full log printed.

    • runTwoThousands

      public void runTwoThousands()
      This program launch 2000 games as follows : 1. Simulation of 1000 games of the best bot against the second best (with others bots to complete). 2. Simulation of 1000 games of the best bot against itself (or as many clone of itself than players).

    • runCsv

      public void runCsv()
      Run several simulations while reading “stats/gamestats.csv” if it exists and adding new statistics.
